summary: In this sequel to Psycho-Pass TV show, Inspector Tsunemori is sent to a neighboring war-torn nation, where the Sibyl System is being introduced as an experiment, to find Shinya Kogami, her former enforcer who went rogue three years ago.
cast: Bryn Apprill|Major Attaway|Z. Charles Bolton|Cole Brown|Bob Carter|Leah Clark|Corey Cleary-Stoner|Dallas Clifton|Michael Federico|Cris George|Josh Grelle|Kana Hanazawa|Jean-Luc Hester|Noriko Hidaka|Chuck Huber|Unshô Ishizuka|Shizuka Itô|Bradford Jackson|Jason C. Kane|Nick Landis|Cherami Leigh|Linda Leonard|Jason Liebrecht|Andrew Love|Lydia Mackay|Robert McCollum|Mike McFarland|Patrick Morphy|Craig Musser|Kenji Nojima|Alex Organ|Kate Oxley|Justin Pate|Daniel Penz|Ben Phillips|Alan Pollard|Chris Rager|Michelle Rojas|Ayane Sakura|Takahiro Sakurai|Katherine Salavarria|Jad Saxton|Jeffrey Schmidt|Lucas Schuneman|Lindsay Seidel|Tomokazu Seki|Matt Thurston|Hiroki Touchi|Eric Vale|David Wald|Christopher Wehkamp|Sarah Wiedenheft|Kazuhiro Yamaji|Stephanie Young
title: Psycho-Pass. La película
